sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const TuitListItem = ( { tuit = { "_id": 234, "topic": "Space", "userName": "SpaceX", "time": "2h", "title": "100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonistsbeing building Mars Base 1", "image": "NASA_400x400.jpeg", "photo": "spaceX_starship.jpeg", "liked": true, "replies": 123, "retuits": 432, "likes": 2345, "handle": "@spacex", "tuit": "You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars" } } ) => { return (
  • {tuit.userName} {tuit.handle} • {tuit.time}

    ${tuit.title}

    ${tuit.title == "" ? `` : `

    ${tuit.title}

    `} ${tuit.tuit == "" ? `` : `

    ${tuit.tuit}

    `}
    {tuit.replies}
    {tuit.retuits}
    {tuit.liked && } {tuit.liked || } {tuit.likes}
    • ); }; export default TuitListItem;
